message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, I was hoping to keep my budget around $80. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $90?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your offer. I would like to propose a price of $100 to see if we can reach an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway again at $115, but I think that's as low as I can go.
